title: Transtype and .vfb files.
content:
I need some advice on setting my .vfb files that I’ve created on a windows machine and would like to convert to mac font files on a mac machine using TransType.  
Here’s pictures of my settings:  
For my Type 1 .vfb:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ps_settings_6114.jpg)
  
I’m not sure if I should have Name or Unicode selected in the first box with the type 1 file.

For my TrueType .vfb:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tt_settings_6589.jpg)
  
Any advice on the best settings for these?
 [‹ OpenType Kerning not working](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235126/http:/typophile.com/node/20550 "Go to previous forum topic") [TransType Pro Bug? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808235126/http:/typophile.com/node/9796 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bvfonts
